CURRENT_RADIO_DESC: Shows the currently playing radio station
ADD_TO_EXISTING_DESC: Add the station to an existing playlist
STATION_NAME_DESC: Name of the radio station to save
CREATE_NEW_DESC: Create a new playlist and add the station
HOW_TO_USE_TEXT:
1. Play a radio station
2. Open these plugin settings
3. The station name is detected automatically
4. Choose an existing playlist OR create a new one
5. Click “Save”

Volumio stores playlists under /data/playlist/.
FAVORITES_DESC: Quickly save the current station to your favorites playlist
FAVORITE_PLAYLIST_NAME_DESC: Name of the favorites playlist (will be created automatically if missing)
AUTO_MODE_DESC: Automatically adds every newly played radio station to a playlist
AUTO_MODE_PLAYLIST_DESC: New stations will be saved automatically into this playlist
DUPLICATE_INFO: Station is already in the playlist
NO_PLAYLISTS_TEXT:
There are currently no playlists.

Please create one first:
Browse → Playlists → New playlist.

The playlist selection will appear automatically.
WORKFLOW_TIP_TEXT:
Tip:

You can open Volumio in two browser tabs or windows:
• Tab 1: Change radio station
• Tab 2: Keep this plugin page open

After switching stations click “Refresh” and save.
